languages.text: "Префект Вультур. За попытку оклеветать и убить Помазанни{mf|ка|цу} Императора и за покушение на священную десятину ты приговариваешься к смерти!"
"Prefect Vultur, for attempting to slander and kill one of the Emperor's anointed and for encroaching upon the Imperial Tithe, I hereby sentence you to death!"
languages.original_text: "Префект Вультур. За попытку оклеветать и убить Помазанни{mf|ка|цу} Императора и за покушение на священную десятину ты приговариваешься к смерти!"

traits.locale_text: "Prefect Vultur, for attempting to slander and kill one of the Emperor's anointed and for encroaching upon the Imperial Tithe, I hereby sentence you to death!"
"Prefect Vultur, for attempting to slander and kill one of the Emperor's anointed and for encroaching upon the Imperial Tithe, I hereby sentence you to death!"
"Prefect Vultur, for attempting to slander and kill one of the Emperor's anointed and for encroaching upon the Imperial Tithe, I hereby sentence you to death!"
"Prefect Vultur, for attempting to slander and kill one of the Emperor's anointed and for encroaching upon the Imperial Tithe, I hereby sentence you to death!"
"Prefect Vultur, for attempting to slander and kill one of the Emperor's anointed and for encroaching upon the Imperial Tithe, I hereby sentence you to death!"
"Prefect Vultur, for attempting to slander and kill one of the Emperor's anointed and for encroaching upon the Imperial Tithe, I hereby sentence you to death!"

languages.text: "Präfektin Vultur, für die versuchte Verleumdung und Ermordung {mf|eines|einer} Gesalbten und die Unterschlagung des imperialen Zehnts verurteile ich Euch hiermit zum Tode!"
languages.original_text: "Prefect Vultur, for attempting to slander and kill one of the Emperor's anointed and for encroaching upon the Imperial Tithe, I hereby sentence you to death!"

traits.locale_text: "Präfektin Vultur, für die versuchte Verleumdung und Ermordung {mf|eines|einer} Gesalbten und die Unterschlagung des imperialen Zehnts verurteile ich Euch hiermit zum Tode!"

languages.text: « Préfète Vultur, pour avoir tenté de calomnier et de tuer {mf|un élu|une élue} de l'Empereur et pour vous être approprié la dîme impériale, je vous condamne à mort ! »
languages.original_text: "Prefect Vultur, for attempting to slander and kill one of the Emperor's anointed and for encroaching upon the Imperial Tithe, I hereby sentence you to death!"

traits.locale_text: « Préfète Vultur, pour avoir tenté de calomnier et de tuer {mf|un élu|une élue} de l'Empereur et pour vous être approprié la dîme impériale, je vous condamne à mort ! »

languages.text: “沃尔图尔行政官，你预谋诽谤、暗害帝皇的神选者，还侵占了神圣的帝国什一税，我在此判处你死刑！”
languages.original_text: "Prefect Vultur, for attempting to slander and kill one of the Emperor's anointed and for encroaching upon the Imperial Tithe, I hereby sentence you to death!"

traits.locale_text: “沃尔图尔行政官，你预谋诽谤、暗害帝皇的神选者，还侵占了神圣的帝国什一税，我在此判处你死刑！”

languages.text: «Prefecta Vultur, por calumniar e intentar asesinar a un{mf||a} ungid{mf|o|a} del Emperador, y por intentar apropiarse del diezmo Imperial, ¡queda condenada a muerte!».
languages.original_text: "Prefect Vultur, for attempting to slander and kill one of the Emperor's anointed and for encroaching upon the Imperial Tithe, I hereby sentence you to death!"

traits.locale_text: «Prefecta Vultur, por calumniar e intentar asesinar a un{mf||a} ungid{mf|o|a} del Emperador, y por intentar apropiarse del diezmo Imperial, ¡queda condenada a muerte!».

languages.text: 「ヴァルター総監、皇帝陛下に選ばれし者の一人を誹謗中傷し殺害しようとしたこと、そして帝国租税を侵害したことに対し、ここに死刑を宣告する！」
languages.original_text: "Prefect Vultur, for attempting to slander and kill one of the Emperor's anointed and for encroaching upon the Imperial Tithe, I hereby sentence you to death!"

traits.locale_text: 「ヴァルター総監、皇帝陛下に選ばれし者の一人を誹謗中傷し殺害しようとしたこと、そして帝国租税を侵害したことに対し、ここに死刑を宣告する！」

languages.text: "Prefekt Vultur, İmparator'un meshettiği şahsa iftira atma ve onu öldürmeye teşebbüs etme suçlarından, ayrıca İmparatorluk Aşarı'na göz dikmekten seni idama mahkûm ediyorum!"
languages.original_text: "Prefect Vultur, for attempting to slander and kill one of the Emperor's anointed and for encroaching upon the Imperial Tithe, I hereby sentence you to death!"

traits.locale_text: "Prefekt Vultur, İmparator'un meshettiği şahsa iftira atmaya ve onu öldürmeye teşebbüs etmekten, ayrıca İmparatorluk Aşarı'na göz dikmekten dolayı seni idama mahkûm ediyorum!"
